title: セッション
content:
[[include :pseudo-scp-jp:teruteru-tale-theme |toggle-sidebar=a]]

[[module css]]
p {
    font-family: 'ComicNeueAngularRegular', 'MS Comic Sans', 'Comic Sans', sans-serif;
}

.hr-black {
    margin-top: 0.5em;
    margin-bottom: 0.5em;
    margin-left: 2em;
    margin-right: 2em;
    border: solid 1px #000000;
    border-radius: 5px;
}
[[/module]]
@@ @@
[[include :scp-jp:credit:start]]
**タイトル:** セッション
**著者:** [[user teruteru_5]]
**作成年:** 2024
-----
//[[[author:teruteru-5|この著者の他の作品]]]//
-----
= **コンテンツ警告**
当ページには著しい肉体破壊描写が含まれています。苦手な方は閲覧せず、ブラウザバックすることを推奨します。
[[include :scp-jp:credit:end]]

[[include :scp-jp:component:info-cw]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

]]

|usericon= http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:7178014-393-k0m6/6D28F357-605D-47C6-B8C6-04A62D869AC3.png
|usercolor=#00ff7f
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-user= --]
|user-id=six
|username=まわすくん
|usericon= http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:7178014-397-bq33/IMG_3632.jpeg
|usercolor=#00bfff
]]

[[==]]
以下のファイルは某インターネット掲示板にて「たすけてくれ.pdf」というファイル名で公開されていました。なお、ファイルには付属で動画が添付されていましたが、そちらは心理面に与える影響を考慮し、取り除かれています。
[[/==]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="hr-black"]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div style="border: solid 1px #000; background-color: #fff; margin-top: 1em; margin-padding: 1em; padding: 0.5em;"]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
**##999999|[たすけて.mp4(除去済みファイル)]##**
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[div_ class="discord"]]
[[div_ class="messages-panel"]]
[[div_ class="messages-group"]]
[[div_ class="messages"]]

[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:01
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

[[span class="at_mention"]]@everyone[[/span]]

それじゃあ、セッションを始めたいと思います。

まあ今更みんなに言うことでもないけど、ここでやってることは秘密で頼むよ。あと例のヤツも忘れんなよ。これバレたらみんな警察行きだからね

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message two"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
シノハラ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:02
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

分かってるって。俺たちを馬鹿にすんなよ？

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message five"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
空見
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:02
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

それで、今日のNPCは誰なんですか？
いつも同じような浮浪者ばかりだからなんかマンネリ感じちゃうんだよなあ……

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:03
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

いつもと同じく浮浪者だよ　名前なんだっけ、タカシとかだった気がする
仕方ねえじゃんリスク取りたくねえもん
やだよそこらにいるやつ捕まえてセッションしたら逮捕されましたなんて
皆から見放されてるやつなら文句言われないだろ
例のヤツは事後処理的に使うものだし、捕まえる時は使えないんだよ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message five"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
空見
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:05
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

まじかよ
まあ仕方ないのは分かるけど
またかあ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message four"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
かえで
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:05
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

まあセッションできるだけマシだし……

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message five"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
空見
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:06
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

それはそうだけどよお

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message two"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
シノハラ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:06
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

そういやコーイチいなくね？
[[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]] セッションだぞー

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message five"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
空見
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:07
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

[[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]]
便乗して俺もメンションしよ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message four"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
かえで
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:07
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

メンション連打だ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message five"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
空見
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:09
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

[[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]] [[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]] [[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]]
[[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]] [[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]] [[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]]
[[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]] [[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]] [[span class="at_mention"]]@コーイチ[[/span]]
@@@@
うおお地獄のメンション連打

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message three"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
コーイチ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:15
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

ごめん遅れた
ところでメンションが凄いことになってるんだけど、何？
また空見か
あと例のヤツもOK

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message five"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
空見
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:16
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

またってなんだよ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message three"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
コーイチ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:17
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

お前いつもメンションしまくるだろ
メンション魔王って呼ばれたの忘れたのか

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message five"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
空見
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:17
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

忘れてないけどさ、もうちょっとこう、手心ってものを

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:18
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

まあとにかく全員集まったし
[[span class="at_mention"]]@everyone[[/span]]
改めて、セッションを始めます。
今回はそこら辺にいた浮浪者がNPCです
まあ目立つところもないやつって感じかなあ、多分あとは残らないはず　処理もするし
まあ今はいつもの森にいて、周りブルーシートで囲ってんだけども
何かしてほしいことあったら宣誓のあとにダイスロールよろしくな

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message two"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
シノハラ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:19
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

[[span class="at_mention"]]@高田っちゃん[[/span]]
じゃあ、日本刀ってある？
この前漫画で読んだあれやりたくて
汚物みたいだし、一瞬でえいってやりたいんだけど

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:19
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

ない。てか俺が日本刀なんて持ってるわけないだろ
そんなん持ってたら捕まるじゃん

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message two"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
シノハラ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:20
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

そっかあ……

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:20
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

そっかあ……じゃねえよ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message four"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
かえで
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:20
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

[[span class="at_mention"]]@高田っちゃん[[/span]] じゃあ、フルーツナイフってある？なければその場にある刃物でいいんだけど。

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message two"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
シノハラ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:20
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

あーそっか、日本刀ないなら刃物にすりゃよかったのか

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message five"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
空見
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:21
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

あーそっかじゃねえよアホ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:21
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

フルーツナイフあるよ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message three"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
コーイチ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:21
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

あるんだ
てかフルーツナイフだからあるわなそりゃ
誰でも持てる手軽な刃物

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message two"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
シノハラ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:22
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

アホじゃねえし
てかフルーツナイフあるのか
じゃあ後で何かできるかもな

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message four"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
かえで
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:23
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

じゃあ、フルーツナイフで右耳削ぎ落としお願いします

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:23
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

おけ　じゃあダイスロールどうぞ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message four"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
かえで
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:23
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

1d100 70 フルーツナイフで右耳削ぎ落とし

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message six"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
まわすくん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:23
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

[[span class="at_mention"]]@かえで[[/span]]
1d100 70 → 53/成功

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message five"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
空見
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:24
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

おっ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message three"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
コーイチ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:24
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

決まったねえ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message four"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
かえで
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:23
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

まあ最初から外したらやばいし

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:27
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

NPCはフルーツナイフによって右耳を削がれてしまいました
呻きながらこちらを涙目で睨んでいます
耳があったところからは血が出ています
何やら、時折こちらの名前を呼んでいるようです

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message two"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
シノハラ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:27
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

名前呼ぶなって……　いくら例のヤツで誤魔化せるとはいえ心臓に悪いって……
まあ一旦、一旦応急処置しようぜ
その方が長く遊べるし
[[span class="at_mention"]]@高田っちゃん[[/span]]
てことでダイスロール行っていい？

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:27
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

えあよ
ええよ

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message three"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
コーイチ
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:28
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

[[span class="at_mention"]]@高田っちゃん[[/span]]
じゃあそれ終わったらケツと尿道に木の棒詰めてくれませんか？無理なら脚の爪を剥がして口に詰めるとかでもいいんですけど。

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="message one"]]
[[div_ class="icon"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="body"]]
[[div_ class="userblock"]]
[[div_ class="user-name"]]
高田っちゃん
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="msg-time"]]
2024/11/12 0:28
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="content"]]

[[==]]
なお、上記における「セッション」や「PL」などの語はテーブルゲームのひとつであるTRPGに因んだものであるとされています。どうやら、KPとNPC──つまるところの主導者と被害者──は毎回変わっていたようです。

どうやらその後もセッションは続いているようですが、それが明るみに出ていないことから、真相は明らかになっていません。情報自体拡散されていないため、誰も気付いていないのだと思われます。

はやく、気付くといいなって思います。
